root: ^This much gold should be enough to hire more goblins. They are definitely not powerful, but this is the best we can do for now.

who: ^Wait a minute.. I don't even remember who you are.
^Do you truly remember nothing after all we did together..?
^Oh.. Well.. I'm sure they'll come back once we finish conquering the world !
go: ^Alright. Let's get to it before dawn.. Lilith..?
^Lilith..? She did not make it.. I.. would be thankful if you could remember my name, my Lord..
^It's Alith. Please don't forget it again.
